title: Clockmaker Ahmed Mohamed: 'Judge A Person By Their Heart'
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Impact - Today 
WASHINGTON -- America's favorite teenage clockmaker is taking on a new role: civil rights activist. Ahmed Mohamed, 14, is a Sudanese-Amer...
